metadata.title: hawk: REDoS in hawk.utils.parseHost() when parsing Host header (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A regular expression denial of service (ReDoS) was found in Hawk in its header parsing functionality. The issue arises from inadequate input validation in the Hawk.utils.parseHost() function when processing untrusted input with regular expressions. This flaw allows an attacker to send a specially crafted HTTP header to initiate a ReDoS attack. 
            STATEMENT: This flaw is out of support scope and will not be addressed for the dotnet-5.0 product. Please see https://access.redhat.com/support/policy/updates/net-core for more information about dotnet support scope.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 is installed
firefox is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
